entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening then northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
